org.lwjgl.system.glfw

Class WindowCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.glfw.WindowCallback
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WindowCallbackAdapter

    public abstract class WindowCallback
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates callback functionality for all window-specific GLFW callback methods.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public static void set(long window,
       WindowCallback proc)
        Enables all window event callbacks for the given GLFW window.
        Parameters:
        window - the GLFW window
        proc - the WindowCallback instance, or NULL to disable event callbacks.

      • set

        public static void set(long window,
       WindowCallback proc,
       java.util.EnumSet eventTypes)
        Enables window event callbacks for the given GLFW window. The eventTypes parameter is a bit-field the defines which type of events to enable.
        Parameters:
        window - the GLFW window
        proc - the WindowCallback instance, or NULL to disable event callbacks.
        eventTypes - the event types bit-field

      • windowPos

        public abstract void windowPos(long window,
             int xpos,
             int ypos)
        The window move callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that was moved
        xpos - the new x-coordinate, in pixels, of the upper-left corner of the client area of the window
        ypos - the new y-coordinate, in pixels, of the upper-left corner of the client area of the window
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetWindowPosCallback(long, long)

      • windowSize

        public abstract void windowSize(long window,
              int width,
              int height)
        The window resize callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that was resized
        width - the new width, in pixels, of the window
        height - the new height, in pixels, of the window
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetWindowSizeCallback(long, long)

      • windowClose

        public abstract void windowClose(long window)
        The window close callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that the user attempted to close
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetWindowCloseCallback(long, long)

      • windowRefresh

        public abstract void windowRefresh(long window)
        The window refresh callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window whose content needs to be refreshed
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetWindowRefreshCallback(long, long)

      • windowFocus

        public abstract void windowFocus(long window,
               int focused)
        The window focus callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that was focused or defocused
        focused - GL11.GL_TRUE if the window was focused, or GL11.GL_FALSE if it was defocused
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetWindowFocusCallback(long, long)

      • windowIconify

        public abstract void windowIconify(long window,
                 int iconified)
        The window iconify callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that was iconified or restored.
        iconified - GL11.GL_TRUE if the window was iconified, or GL11.GL_FALSE if it was restored
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetWindowIconifyCallback(long, long)

      • framebufferSize

        public abstract void framebufferSize(long window,
                   int width,
                   int height)
        The framebuffer size callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window whose framebuffer was resized
        width - the new width, in pixels, of the framebuffer
        height - the new hieght, in pixels, of the framebuffer
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetFramebufferSizeCallback(long, long)

      • key

        public abstract void key(long window,
       int key,
       int scancode,
       int action,
       int mods)
        The key callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that received the event
        key - the keyboard key that was pressed or released
        action - the key action. One of:

        GLFW.GLFW_PRESS, GLFW.GLFW_RELEASE, GLFW.GLFW_REPEAT

        mods - bitfield describing which modifiers keys were held down
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetKeyCallback(long, long)

      • character

        public abstract void character(long window,
             int codepoint)
        The char callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that received the event
        codepoint - the Unicode code point of the character
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetCharCallback(long, long)

      • charMods

        public abstract void charMods(long window,
            int codepoint,
            int mods)
        This Unicode character with modifiers callback. It is called for each input character, regardless of what modifier keys are held down.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that received the event
        codepoint - the Unicode code point of the character
        mods - bitfield describing which modifier keys were held down
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetCharModsCallback(long, long)

      • mouseButton

        public abstract void mouseButton(long window,
               int button,
               int action,
               int mods)
        The mouse button callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that received the event
        button - the mouse button that was pressed or released
        action - the button action. One of:

        GLFW.GLFW_PRESS, GLFW.GLFW_RELEASE

        mods - bitfield describing which modifiers keys were held down
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetMouseButtonCallback(long, long)

      • cursorPos

        public abstract void cursorPos(long window,
             double xpos,
             double ypos)
        The cursor move callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that received the event
        xpos - the new x-coordinate, in screen coordinates of the cursor
        ypos - the new y-coordinate, in screen coordinates of the cursor
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetCursorPosCallback(long, long)

      • cursorEnter

        public abstract void cursorEnter(long window,
               int entered)
        The cursor enter callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that received the event
        entered - GL11.GL_TRUE if the cursor enter the window's client area, or GL11.GL_FALSE if it left it
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetCursorEnterCallback(long, long)

      • scroll

        public abstract void scroll(long window,
          double xoffset,
          double yoffset)
        The scroll callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that received the event
        xoffset - the scroll offset along the x-axis
        yoffset - the scroll offset along the y-axis
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetScrollCallback(long, long)

      • drop

        public abstract void drop(long window,
        int count,
        long names)
        The file drop callback.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that received the event
        count - the number of dropped files
        names - pointer to the array of UTF-8 encoded path names of the dropped files
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwSetDropCallback(long, long)
